newsitem.title: USA: Exabyte names Marriner acting pres/CEO.
newsitem.headline: Exabyte names Marriner acting pres/CEO.

text.p: Exabyte Corp Tuesday said it named William Marriner as the company's acting president and chief executive officer.
Marriner will also retain the title of chief financial officer, a position he has held since he joined the company in 1987.
Peter Behrendt, who joined the company as president in 1987, became chief executive in 1990 and was named chairman of the board in 1992, will continue as the company's full-time chairman.
The company previously announced that it intended to split what had been a dual role -- chairman and president/CEO -- into two positions and that it was initiating a search for a president/CEO.
Exabyte designs, manufactures and markets tape storage products, including 8mm and minicartridge tape drives, 8mm and 4mm tape libraries and recording media.
